name: Element
short_description: Secure and decentralized Matrix chat client for communication.
description: Secure and decentralized Matrix chat client for communication. Element is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, security, chat, messaging. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Element on your home server to secure and decentralized matrix chat client for communication without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Element to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
